thread.title: Squishy toys, unicorns, and poop at 2018 Toy Fair

title: Squishy toys, unicorns, and poop at 2018 Toy Fair
text:
Squishy toys, unicorns, and poop at 2018 Toy Fair 1:17am GMT - 02:24 
More than 1,000 toy makers showcased their latest products at the 2018 New York Toy Fair. The most notable trends included squishy toys, unicorns and poop play. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
